hero.title: Choose Your Plan
hero.description: Simple, transparent pricing for businesses of all sizes. Start warming up your domains and sending campaigns today.

business.title: Business
business.description: Ideal for growing businesses starting with email outreach.

premium.title: Premium
premium.description: For established businesses scaling their outreach efforts.

custom.title: Custom
custom.description: Tailored solutions for large enterprises or specific needs.

items.question: Is there a free tier or trial?
items.answer: We do not offer a free tier, but we do have a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you are not satisfied, contact us within 30 days, and we will refund your payment.

items.question: I don't like some part of the plan or have suggestions.
items.answer: We'd love to hear from you! Please email us at feedback@penguinmails.com with your suggestions. If we implement your suggestion, we'll give you a lifetime discount on your plan.

header.title: Create Your Account
header.description: Join PenguinMails to start sending successful campaigns.

newAccount.title: You are creating a new account.

joining.title: You are joining an existing business.
joining.description: Your account will be associated with the provided Business ID.

error.title: Error
error.selectPlan: Please select a plan to continue.
error.generic: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

success.title: Registration Successful!
success.description: Your account is ready. You can now log in to your dashboard.
success.autoRedirect: You will be redirected to the dashboard in {{seconds}} seconds.

articlesPage.title: Title
articlesPage.errorLoading: Error loading articles. Please try again.
articlesPage.createArticleDescription: Fill out the fields below to create a new knowledge base article. You can provide translations for each language.
articlesPage.editArticleDescription: Edit the fields below to update this knowledge base article. You can provide translations for each language.

errorBoundary.title: Something went wrong.
errorBoundary.description: We've been notified of the issue and are working to fix it. Please try again later or contact our support team.
errorBoundary.contactSupport: You can also report the error directly to our support team.

general.title: General Settings
general.description: Manage your account preferences and profile information

security.title: Security Settings
security.description: Manage your account security and authentication

errors.tooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long

twoFactorAuth.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactorAuth.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
twoFactorAuth.protectedMessage: Your account is protected with an additional layer of security.

notifications.title: Notification Preferences
notifications.description: Choose how you want to be notified

options.onlyUrgent: Only send bill and urgent business emails

team.delete_member_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}? This action cannot be undone.
